class_description:
Thrown when the Serialization runtime detects one of the following
 problems with a Class.

params.param_description: String describing the reason for the exception.

Methods.method_description: Report an InvalidClassException for the reason specified.

params.param_description: a String naming the invalid class.
a String describing the reason for the exception.

return_description:
the detail message string of this Throwable instance
          (which may be null).

Methods.method_description: Produce the message and include the classname, if present.
